result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin Lee Sain was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Justin Lee Sain is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Justin Lee Sain was found guilty of Negligent Operation of Motor Vehicle, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.01(1).
  • Justin Lee Sain was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:30 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Justin L Sain. Defendant Justin L Sain in court. Includes 22TR39, 22TR40, and 22CF6. Court reviews case. ADA Rockow recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands and pleads Guilty to 22CF6 AMENDED Count 1: Negligent Operation of Motor Vehicle- 941.01 and Count 3: Resisting or Obstructing Officer- 946.41(1) . Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered plea and waived rights. Court accepts plea and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty. Upon motion of the State, Court dismisses 22CF6 Count 2, 22TR40, and 22TR39. Sentencing arguments.  

Court Orders:

Count 1: 
- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Surcharge: $200.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample 

Count 3: 
- Court Costs: $243.00. Apply Bond. Balance to be pd through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample

11:03 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Holly Elkin Rockow, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi, DF: Justin Lee Sain appeared from jail. Includes 22TR39, 22TR40, and 22CF6. ADA Rockow has provided all discovery. Atty Dolfi has reviewed discovery with DE and an offer has been provided but not accepting at this time. DE is facing revocation out of St. Croix Co and has sentencing after revocation set for 04/26/22 and also has an open Pierce County matter. Request to set out to know outcome of revocation.  DE is currently on a PO hold. Court sets STC. Adjourned 11:10 PM  Status conference scheduled for May 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

for Protective Order. Filed by ADA Rockow. km
Pre-trial conference on March 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.

** AMENDED** 

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, J.L.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel. ADA:   Holly Elkin Rockow   DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Justin Lee Sain appeared from jail. INCLUDES: 22CF6, 22TR39 and 22TR40 (STC). Court notes approval for zoom by DE, advises DE of right to appear in person; DE wishes to proceed with ARGN via zoom.  Court notes Information filed 1/13. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.  Bond will continue in form and amount. Atty Dolfi would like to modify to a signature bond. Atty Rockow argues for some cash. Court confirms address of DE.  Court amends bond. Adjourned at: 3:40 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.
